attributes.action: Stop buying oil and gas from Russia immediately!
attributes.additional_details: By doing this, even if we have to ration fuel and prices go up. We stand with the Ukrainian people and help stop the supply of wealth to the Russian leaders who have illegally invaded Ukraine. The Ukrainians do not have much time. We need to act fast. This is bigger than Ukraine. It is a fight for freedom. If we fail to act and allow this to happen, the world we create is a dystopian one. This is a small act but one in the right direction. Act now. Take a stand. We are all war. Step up.
attributes.background: The invasion of Ukraine while heavy sanctions have been made. Is still being funded by the sail of oil and gas. We are supporting this invasion by continuing to buy from them.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Ban all imports of Russian oil and gas immediately: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610289

Since you started your petition the Government has announced plans to phase out Russian oil imports by the end of the year. Find out more here: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/uk-to-phase-out-russian-oil-imports

And you can find details of the UK’s sanctions regime relating to Russia here: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/uk-sanctions-on-russia
